question: Match the column-I with column-II and choose the correct option from the following:
| Column - I (Plant groups) | Column - II (Examples) |
| 1. Bryophyta | p. Pinus |
| 2. Gymnosperm | q. Adiantum |
| 3. Algae | r. Sphagnum |
| 4. Pteridophyta | s. Ectocarpus |
explanation: Bryophyta -> Sphagnum (r). Gymnosperm -> Pinus (p). Algae -> Ectocarpus (s). Pteridophyta -> Adiantum (q).
